title: Certificate Academy Cloud Foundations
description: Certificate Academy Cloud Foundations is a valuable certification for anyone who wants to start a career in cloud computing. The certification covers the fundamental concepts of cloud computing, including virtualization, storage, networking, and security. It provides a good foundation for understanding the different cloud service models, deployment models, and vendor-specific solutions.
